org.apache.reef.runtime.common.driver.idle

Interface DriverIdlenessSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClockIdlenessSource, EventHandlerIdlenessSource, ResourceManagerStatus

    public interface DriverIdlenessSource
    Implementations of this interface are used to determine driver idleness.

      • getIdleStatus

        IdleMessage getIdleStatus()
        Returns:
        the idle status of the component.
